sentence: “I trust Leon and Wes and Scott,” Randle said of the Knicks braintrust — president Leon Rose, senior adviser William Wesley and general manager Scott Perry.
author: Greg Joyce
title: Quentin Grimes’ work ethic impressing Knicks, Tom Thibodeau

author: Marc Berman
title: Julius Randle not listening to trade ‘gossip’ as low value likely keeps him Knick
